name: WaterWorld (itch)
description:
The future: The polar ice caps have melted,covering the Earth with water. Those who survived have adapted to a new world. But a new enemy lurks - Hunters. Kill them and save your people. Make it count.

Controls - 

  • Menu Button To Start (When Prompted)
  • Trigger to Grab Things
  • Grip Button To Shoot or Throw
  • TrackPadDown to activate Lighter
  • TrackPad to Teleport
  • Pick up a Magazine , load it and start shooting
  • You can use two guns at the same time too!

Test Specs

  • HTC Vive Tested Only
  • Windows
  • 2080 TI 
  • 24GB RAM
  • i7
